thread.title: BRIEF-British Columbia AG Says Will Be Filing Reference Case On Jurisdiction Regarding Kinder Morgan Canada's Trans Mountain Expansion

title: BRIEF-British Columbia AG Says Will Be Filing Reference Case On Jurisdiction Regarding Kinder Morgan Canada's Trans Mountain Expansion

organizations.name: morgan canada's trans mountain expansion reuters staff

text:
Market News April 18, 2018 / 4:30 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-British Columbia AG Says Will Be Filing Reference Case On Jurisdiction Regarding Kinder Morgan Canada's Trans Mountain Expansion Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 18 (Reuters) - BRITISH COLUMBIA AG : 
* BRITISH COLUMBIA AG SAYS GOVERNMENT WILL BE FILING REFERENCE CASE ON JURISDICTION REGARDING KINDER MORGAN CANADAâ€™S TRANS MOUNTAIN EXPANSION WITHIN 10 WORKING DAYS Further company coverage:
